name: Lords of the Realm 2: Siege Pack
name_original: Lords of the Realm 2: Siege Pack
description:
Lords of the Realm 2: Siege Pack is a strategy game developed by Impressions Software. It was originally released in 1997. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Lords of the Realm 2: Siege Pack is available on PC.
